sentences.english: A clock and two vases stood on the mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 壁爐臺上擺着一個座鐘和兩個花瓶。

sentences.english: A silver vase stood on the mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 一隻銀質花瓶擺放在壁爐臺上。

sentences.english: On the mantelplace was a bust of Keats on a pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 壁爐臺上有一尊放在墊座上的濟慈胸像。

sentences.english: Only the photographs on the mantelpiece really showed how much time had passed.
sentences.chinese: 只有壁爐臺上的照片顯示出流逝了多少時光。

sentences.english: Even the mantel above the fire glowed white.
sentences.chinese: 甚至爐火上方的壁爐臺都泛着白光。

sentences.english: It wouldn't look great on your mantelpiece.
sentences.chinese: 放在你的壁爐臺上，它可能看起來不大。

sentences.english: And there will still be several pounds of ashes left over to display on the mantelpiece .
sentences.chinese: 即使這樣，還會剩下幾磅骨灰可以放在壁爐臺上供奉。

sentences.english: You will find the letter on the mantelpiece .
sentences.chinese: 你會在壁爐臺上找到這封信。
